name: Kosodate Quiz My Angel
overview: Kosodate Quiz My Angel is the Playstation conversion of an Arcade machine (released by Namco on Seta 2nd Generation coin-op hardware) of the same title featuring a new intro movie sequence that wasn't on the original arcade game. The game it’s a multiple-choice trivia game that places you in the role of a proud new parent raising a child in 1990s Japan. Depending on what kinds of questions you answer correctly, the personality of your child will change. She might turn out to be a pretty girl, a pretty girl with short hair, a pretty nerd, or a pretty girl with a mischievous streak. The possibilities are endless. After each round, you can participate in a relaxing and character-building activity with your child, like buying them a picture book, going for a walk, or strolling through the zoo. According to the game progress screen the player can raise his daughter until she’s 60 or 70 years old if he's good enough.
